body:
hi, Lars, thanks for the warm greetings! All the best wishes to you
and the Radiance community! To celebrate I decide to turn on my
computer and generate the lovely "warning! no light source found..."
in the Xmas eve! - hehe, Ji






在 24 Dec, 2011，10:52 PM，"Lars O. Grobe" <grobe at gmx.net> 写道：
